content: > one basic motif on this crochet doily makes it easy to craft to your heart s desire change the overall size by simply switching the weight of the thread **for a small doily** stitch in red heart extra fine crochet thread **for medium** use red heart fine crochet thread **for large** stitch in red heart classic crochet thread finally for an **extra-large doily** stitch in red heart fashion crochet thread choose from any of the following crochet threads * aunt lydia threads in the same sizes as those given * coats big ball 40 crochet hook size 14 0 90mm for motif 2¾ inches * coats big ball 30 crochet hook size 12 1 0mm for motif 3¼ inches * coats big ball 20 crochet hook size 10 1 15mm for motif 4 inches * aunt lydia s® special valuecrochet crochet hook 7 1 5mm for motif 5 inches * j&p coats® knit-cro-sheen® crochet hook size 7 1 5mm for motif 5¼ inches * j&p coats® metallic knit-cro-sheen® crochet hook size 7 1 5mm for motif 5¼ inches * j&p coats® pearl knit-cro-sheen® crochet hook size 7 1 5mm for motif 5¼ inches * south maid® crochet hook size 7 1 5mm for motif 5¼ inches * j&p coats® old fashioned crochet crochet hook size 6 1 6mm for motif 5¼ inches * j&p coats® lustersheen® crochet hook size e-4 3 5mm for motif 7 inches * j&p coats® pearl lustersheen® crochet hook size e-4 3 5mm for motif 7¼ inches * j&p coats® speed-cro-sheen® crochet hook size e-4 3 5mm for motif 7¾ inches * south maid® cotton 8 crochet hook size f-5 3 75mm for motif 9 inches * aunt lydia s® denim crochet hook size h-8 5mm for motif 10¾ inches
